name: Follow for X-Plane
description:
What is ExPlane Follow?

“Ex-Plane Follow” works combined with the computer version of X-Plane flight simulator. It offers a simple but useful functionality to the simulator: tracking the location and the heading of the simulated aircraft in the real-world map.

- Animated Plane on the map.
- Tracks the flight path flown
- Displays the altitude

HOW TO USE

Launch X-Plane on a computer and enter your IP-Address of your Desktop PC in the App.

MULTI-DEVICE CONNECTION

You can connect up to four iPhone/​iPad/iPod Touch devices running multiple X-Plane Follows at the same time. Download and install X-Plane Follow for each device.

This application requires full or demo version of X-Plane 11 (for Mac/​Windows/​Linux). CANNOT be used with X-Plane Mobile
